document.full_text: a pennsylvania zoo has euthanized one of the five oldest male lions in the united states due to age-related ailments, a zoo spokeswoman said on tuesday.
document.title: pennsylvania zoo euthanizes one of country's oldest male lions
lines_and_colors: a pennsylvania zoo has euthanized one of the five oldest male lions in the united states due to age-related ailments, a zoo spokeswoman said on tuesday.
